General.Name: Supalai Public Company Limited
General.Description: Supalai Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in property development business in Thailand and Australia. It owns and operates housing projects, including detached houses, duplex houses, townhouses, and condominiums, as well as develops office buildings, resorts, and hotels for commercial purposes under the Supalai brand. The company also manages hotels; invests in securities; deals and trades in real estate properties; and rents and leases real estate properties. Supalai Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 1011 Supalai Grand Tower Building, Bangkok, Thailand, 10120
